alert.note: Alert for Bladen (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 11 at 12:17AM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Bladen, southeastern Robeson, northwestern Columbus, southern Dillon, northwestern Horry and Marion Counties through 100 AM EST... At 1216 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Horry to near Allsbrook to Brooksville. Movement was north at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Marion, Whiteville, Mullins, Tabor City, Chadbourn, Bethel, Latta, Fair Bluff, Lake View, Sellers, Boardman, Fork, Blue Brick, Zion, Nakina, Gapway, Rains, Southeastern Community College, Williams and Galivants Ferry. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 AM EST for southeastern North Carolina...and northeastern South Carolina.
